0x27561561732A78420x9754C27D// GetNumberOfPedDrawableVariations
int GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS(Ped ped, int componentId);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.componentId: The component id you want to get the drawable variatons of. Refer to SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION
